description: A portrait of a young girl with a serene expression, her face framed by a narrow oval shape with slightly rounded edges. Her eyes are cast downward, gazing at something below the edge of the canvas, while her eyebrows are thin and straight. A soft, gentle light illuminates her features from above, accentuating the subtle curves of her nose and the fullness of her cheeks. The overall palette is subdued, with a predominance of earthy tones - muted browns, tans, and beiges - punctuated by a few wispy strands of dark hair framing her face.
